# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Automatically generated by the script oomph_generate_cmake_script

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16..3.20 FATAL_ERROR)
project(unstructured_2d_biharmonic C CXX Fortran)
find_package(oomphlib REQUIRED)
enable_testing()

oomph_add_executable(
  NAME unstructured_2d_biharmonic_bellelement
  SOURCES unstructured_2d_biharmonic_bellelement.cc
  LIBRARIES oomph::shell
  CXX_STANDARD 11)

oomph_add_executable(
  NAME unstructured_2d_biharmonic_curvedelement
  SOURCES unstructured_2d_biharmonic_curvedelement.cc
  LIBRARIES oomph::shell
  CXX_STANDARD 11)

# ---------------------------------- TESTING ----------------------------------

oomph_add_test(
  TEST_NAME biharmonic.unstructured_2d_biharmonic
  TARGET_DEPENDENCIES unstructured_2d_biharmonic_bellelement
                      unstructured_2d_biharmonic_curvedelement
  EXTRA_REQUIRES Circle1.1.ele Circle1.1.node Circle1.1.poly
  LABELS "biharmonic;unstructured_2d_biharmonic")

# This test needs more than the default allotted time to complete
set_tests_properties(biharmonic.unstructured_2d_biharmonic PROPERTIES TIMEOUT
                                                                      10000)

# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
